description: This project implements a complete quantitative research pipeline for mining, combining, and evaluating alpha factors. It covers the entire lifecycle from data simulation and feature engineering to machine learning optimization (Elastic Net) and rigorous performance testing (Quantile Backtesting, IC Analysis, and Factor Decay).
An open-source machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions.

AI vs. Human Text Detection Framework A machine learning benchmarking system designed to distinguish between AI-generated and human-written text in Bengali and English. It utilizes novel graph-based feature extraction, rigorous statistical validation, and multi-model benchmarking against state-of-the-art baselines like DetectGPT and Grover.

MLForge is an open-source, modular machine learning framework written in C++ that provides a robust foundation for developing, testing, and benchmarking a variety of machine learning algorithms. Its design emphasizes clarity, efficiency, and flexibilitymaking it a powerful tool for both educational and prototyping purposes.

This is the projects where i have trained a model by applying machine learning concepts and after that i have developed a fastAPI based REST backend to expose the trained ML model and applied pydantic schema for validation and for adding UI/UX i have used stramlit framework to this frontend part
An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.
Machine learning-based classification framework for detecting spatially extended and diffuse emission in the high redshift universe, using multi-band broadband imaging.

This project presents an AI-based downscaling framework to convert coarse climate data into fine-resolution local estimates and integrate them with crop yield data to generate crop resilience maps. Machine learning models are trained using historical climate & crop datasets to predict yield under changing climatic conditions.
A security-aware framework for evaluating machine learning anomaly detection in 5G Core networks against realistic adversarial threats and evasion attacks.

AI-Powered Sales Intelligence System untuk perusahaan X yang menganalisis 5,663 pelanggan menggunakan Machine Learning untuk memberikan rekomendasi strategis penjualan melalui framework Next Best Offer (NBO).
Edge-Optimized, Machine Learning Inference Powered, Auto-Scaling Distributed Framework. providing enterprise-grade webAurora solutions with Real-Time Aware architecture
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.
A modular machine learning framework for budget execution & data analysis built in Python with Scikit, XGBoost, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.

This repository contains the complete, end-to-end reproducible pipeline developed for the manuscript:  Integrated Machine Learning and CRISPR Scoring Framework for Prioritizing Therapeutic gRNAs Targeting TCF7L2 in Type 2 Diabetes.
Code for training and validation

This project investigates short-term arrival delay time prediction in freight rail operations using historical operational datasets and machine learning models. The framework captures delay propagation patterns to enhance prediction accuracy, improve operational efficiency, and assist decision-making in freight rail network management.
GoMLX: An Accelerated Machine Learning Framework For Go
A dependently-typed machine learning framework for Lean 4, providing compile-time tensor shape verification.

This project is a comprehensive machine learning application developed as part of my learning journey during the **YBI Foundation 45-Days Internship Program**. The application demonstrates practical implementation of data science concepts, machine learning algorithms, and web development skills using modern Python frameworks.
A reproducible, deployment-oriented evaluation framework for machine learningbased malware detection, featuring packer-aware generalization, low-FPR thresholding, and statistical validation
A flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials.
Selective data removal framework for machine learning models. Enabling GDPR compliance without full model retraining.

Codebase for an XGBoost machine-learning framework applied to biomass estimation. The repository provides preprocessing routines, model training and tuning scripts, performance evaluation, and reproducible workflows supporting the published study.

A Deepfake Detection Framework uses advanced machine learning techniques to analyze images, videos, and audio to identify AI-generated or manipulated content. It helps ensure digital media authenticity by detecting subtle inconsistencies that are invisible to the human eye.

Developed an analytics-driven healthcare transformation framework focused on patient triage, hospital admissions forecasting, and chronic disease prediction, using real-world datasets and machine learning techniques.

P2P lending platforms require effective credit risk assessment to balance default risk against expected returns. Using ~410,000 historical loans from Bondora (2009-2024), this analysis develops a machine learning framework to predict loan defaults and optimize portfolio capital allocation strategies for investors operating under limited capital.
A hands-on laboratory repository for practicing Machine Learning & Deep Learning concepts using Python, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and popular ML/DL frameworks.
SmallML is a three-layer Bayesian framework that enables small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to build production-grade machine learning models despite having limited customer data.
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins

SpectralInsight is an advanced machine learning framework for spectral data analysis, implementing PCA (Principal Component Analysis) and LDA (Linear Discriminant Analysis) dimensionality reduction techniques combined with KNN (K-Nearest Neighbors) classification to evaluate classification performance across different dimensional spaces.
Predict traffic accident severity using advanced machine learning and explainable AI, enhancing road safety with clear insights from comprehensive data analysis.
Basic on-chip machine learning framework for System-on-Chip (SoC) FPGAs using Direct Memory Access.

Designed a two-stage machine learning framework combining Random Forest feature selection and Support Vector Machine (SVM) classification to identify at-risk learners in online education systems.  Achieved improved prediction performance (higher accuracy, recall, and F1-score) compared to baseline models, supporting timely academic intervention.

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations
Discover key research papers on Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and explore transfer learning frameworks, applications, and optimization strategies.

A machine learning framework, dataset and research sub-module about coevolutionary planetary intelligence dynamics. This project explores how nurturing its emergent patterns may lead to a synergistic increase in the overall capability and intelligence of both individual agents and the collective system.

A reproducible framework for auditing domain alignment in latent representations learned from heterogeneous materials datasets. Combines shared-fit PCA/UMAP visualizations, domain separability metrics, and centroid geometry to assess alignment independently of predictive performance.
AI/ML poisoning attack research | Adversarial machine learning | NullSec Framework | @AnonAntics

Predicts customer churn and converts risk scores into actionable retention decisions. The project uses a machine learning model and a cost-benefit framework to select the optimal action threshold based on campaign cost and customer value, enabling targeted interventions and improved retention ROI.
RSRP Prediction Using a Hybrid FriisMachine Learning Framework
an open-sourced highly automated machine learning Python framework for data-driven geochemistry discovery

Experimental framework and Bayesian machine learning pipeline for estimating soil Volumetric Water Content (VWC) using passive UHF RFID technology. Includes physics-informed preprocessing, statistical modeling (Bayesian regression), and sensor data analysis for indirect sensing in smart agriculture and IoUT contexts.

A comprehensive journey through the mathematical foundations of Machine Learning. This repository contains implementations of core ML algorithms built entirely from scratch, focusing on the underlying linear algebra, calculus, and optimization theory. No high-level frameworks are used for the core logicjust pure mathematics translated into code.
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software.

EcoGuard is an intelligent IoT-enabled AI framework designed for real-time detection and prevention of environmental crimes. It leverages sensor networks, machine learning, and automated alerts to monitor ecosystems, identify illegal activities, and support sustainable environmental protection.
Explainable AI (XAI) framework designed to provide transparent, interpretable insights for both tabular and image-based machine learning models.

Companion repository for the paper Threat-Driven Frameworks for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Practitioners Guide (20172025). Contains benchmarking tables, framework metrics, figure sources, and reference summaries for privacy-preserving ML techniques.

Machine learning framework for predicting shoreline segment lengths in Ireland using geospatial metadata. The project applies ensemble regression models with rigorous evaluation and explainable AI (SHAP, LIME), and deploys results through an interactive map to support data-driven coastal risk assessment and policy-relevant decision-making.

A distributed machine learning framework designed for real-world edge deployments where devices are resource-constrained, connections are unreliable and trust cannot be assumed. Built in Rust from the ground up, it brings swarm intelligence and federated learning primitives to environments where PyTorch and TensorFlow cannot operate.

A from-scratch Machine Learning reviewer library focused on understanding the math behind the code. Built as a learning project featuring custom implementations of core algorithms, gradient descent, and model evaluation without relying heavily on high-level ML frameworks.

Reproducible framework for forecasting and optimizing green hydrogen production from solar-powered electrolysis using physics-informed feature engineering, interpretable machine learning (SHAP/LIME), and scenario analysis. Includes public data pipeline, Python notebooks, figures, and LaTeX tables for full transparency.

This project demonstrates a complete machine learning pipeline, from model development to deployment, emphasizing practical usability and clear visualization. It serves as a reference for applying machine learning techniques to tabular healthcare data and for deploying models using lightweight web frameworks such as Streamlit.

This project analyzes time-varying volatility in financial markets using a GARCH(1,1) framework and compares it with machine-learningbased volatility estimation. The study focuses on volatility clustering, regime behavior, and model robustness across calm and stress periods rather than return prediction.
Anacostia is a framework for creating machine learning operations (MLOps) pipelines
Machine learning framework written in C.

Enhanced early-stage fairness analysis in machine learning by developing deep learning models and advanced word embeddings to classify sensitive features from user stories, improving accuracy and contextual understanding over existing frameworks like ReFair.

SIGMA (Smart Intelligent Grid Management Architecture) .SIGMA is an AI framework designed to bring intelligence, resilience, and automation to modern power grids. This project integrates simulation data, machine learning models, and realtime monitoring pipelines to detect, classify, and respond to faults across multiple layers of the grid.
A minimal example of how to share a common wgpu device between the Bevy game engine and the Burn machine learning framework
Auxiliary mechanisms compiled as a machine learning toolkit for the long-term curation of the Monitoring and Evaluating framework.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

A general-purpose, domain-agnostic MLOps framework that automates the complete machine learning lifecycle from data versioning to model deployment and monitoring. Built with open-source tools to avoid vendor lock-in and enable reproducible ML workflows.

A graph-based machine learning framework for Aadhaar data analytics focused on regional coverage assessment, location-change anomaly detection, duplicate identity detection, and interactive dashboard visualization for governance and fraud prevention.
A Machine Learning framework to predict nuclear stability using XGBoost and the NUBASE2020 dataset, featuring SMOTE for class balancing and physics-informed feature analysis.

flowMagic is an R package for automated bivariate gating of flow cytometry (FCM) data. It uses a machine-learning model trained on both experts data and a large, high-quality FCM dataset generated by EVE Online players. The package also provides an extensive visualization toolkit and integrates seamlessly with the flowCore/flowWorkspace frameworks

Integrated multi-scale computational framework for SARS-CoV-2 RBD variant analysis. Combines homology modeling, molecular     dynamics (GROMACS), MM-PBSA binding energetics, and machine learning to predict ACE2/CD147 receptor affinity and immune       escape across 31 variants.

FedEasy is an intuitive powerful yet simple to use Federated Learning framework. Our goal is to streamline the process of setting up and running federated learning experiments with ease, making advanced machine learning techniques accessible to researchers and developers alike.
Advanced Machine Learning framework for detecting market inefficiencies in football odds (2000-2025). Focus on ROI, probability calibration, and algorithmic betting strategies using Python.
YOLOV8

LexTransition AI is an open-source, offline-first legal assistant. It helps users navigate the transition from old Indian laws (IPC/CrPC/IEA) to the new **BNS/BNSS/BSA** frameworks. Using local Machine Learning and OCR, it analyzes legal documents and maps law sections with 100% grounded accuracy.

Final-year Software Engineering student at FAST NUCES Karachi focused on Full Stack Development, Machine Learning, and AI systems. Experienced in building end-to-end web apps using React.js and FastAPI, with hands-on work in modern ML/LLM frameworks, RAG-based architectures, and data-driven real-world solutions.
Revenue forecasting framework combining statistical and machine-learning models to support business development and strategic planning decisions.
Lotus: Characterization of Machine Learning Preprocessing Pipelines via Framework and Hardware Profiling
Open Machine Learning Compiler Framework
Machine learning framework

A collection of comprehensive data science projects that demonstrate practical skills in data analysis, machine learning, deep learning, NLP, SQL & NoSQL databases, big data frameworks, AWS tools, and real-world business problem solving. This portfolio highlights the full workflow of data science.

Aspiring Data Scientist | MSc Data Science & Analytics at Brunel University London. Specialized in Machine Learning, NLP, and architecting AI frameworks for large-scale data fusion (2.8M+ data points). Proficient in Python, R, SQL, and Tableau.

Machine learning framework to predict ICU and hospital length of stay in infants with congenital heart disease undergoing cardiac surgery. Combines representation learning (MKL), clustering, and local models to provide interpretable, personalized predictions from perioperative data.
Application of Machine learning to cloud resource optimization framework using Google Cluster Workload Traces
Darwin: A Framework for Machine Learning Research and Development
This project implements a hybrid machine learning framework for spam detection across multiple Online Social Networks (OSNs).

A multifaceted framework for analysing, modeling, and managing credit risk, combining data engineering, statistical modeling, decision logic, and machine learning to support accurate risk assessment, monitoring, and smarter lending strategies
An explainable, high-performance intrusion detection framework evaluating black-box machine learning models using SHAP and LIME.

This C++ machine learning framework uses concepts, templates, and expression templates for efficient, modular neural network development. It supports matrix operations, layers (e.g., `weight_net_t`, `sigmoid_net_t`), optimizers (SGD, Adam, Nadam), and initialization methods (Xavier, He). Designed for performance and extensibility.
A Python framework to predict machine learning model failures using uncertainty estimation and confidence analysis
A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits
A unified scientific machine learning framework built on JAX/Flax NNX

This repository contains the code and simulation framework used in the paper:      Comparing Optimal Transport and Machine Learning Approaches for Data Merging Under Missing Covariate Scenarios: Application to Clinical Research
A framework for developing multi-scale arrays for use in scientific machine learning (SciML) simulations

Official implementation of the paper "Self-Supervised Hypergraph Training Framework via Structure-Aware Learning" published in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI) 2025.
Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.
Simulation of Machine Consciousness with Dream-Based Learning | Remn Framework | IIT Phi Tracker

CircumSpectrum is a flux-based framework that converts bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data into metabolic fingerprints using genome-scale models and machine learning. It includes RADAR, SOURIS, and CORALIE modules for reaction-level, cross-cohort, and multi-tier correlation analyses.

This project presents a robust analytics framework for evaluating tourism performance across India. Through KPIs, machine learning models, and interactive visualizations.  The project enhances Indias potential to boost domestic and international tourism sustainably and effectively.

Anti Chinese government propaganda.  996.ICU709Friends who live in China and have real name on account, please don't star this repo, or else the police might pay you a visit.  Home to the mega-FAQ, news compilation, restaurant and music recommendations.Heil Xi . 6.4

A data-driven personal finance analytics system that calculates income tax liability under the Indian tax framework, assesses financial health using key indicators, and predicts financial stress levels with explainable insights. Built as an educational decision-support tool using Python, FastAPI, and machine learning techniques.
